### 1. Propensity Score Estimation
We define the propensity score as:
$$e(x) = Pr(T =1|X=x)$$
We assume that: 
$$0<e(x)<1$$
for all x, here we denote X as the covariates of p-dimensional vector of pre-treatment variables.
